LanguageData.ReUplandRice.label: Upland rice
LanguageData.ReUplandRice.description: Improve the rice productivity. Allows sowing of upland rice.
LanguageData.ReWetlandRice.label: Semiaquatic rice
LanguageData.ReWetlandRice.description: Develop semiaquatic rice and paddy fields to further improve rice productivity.
LanguageData.ReGlutinousRice.label: Glutinous rice
LanguageData.ReGlutinousRice.description: Sow glutinous rice, a type of sticky rice usable in a variety of food preparations. \nUnlocks: glutinous rice (min skill: 4), mortar and pestle sets, and 7 more recipes involving sticky rice.
LanguageData.ReThreshingRiceMillingMachine.label: All-purpose rice processing machine
LanguageData.ReThreshingRiceMillingMachine.descriptio: Build agricultural tools which convert ears of rice into white or brown rice.
LanguageData.ReAquacultureFish.label: Fish farming net
LanguageData.ReAquacultureFish.description: Learn how to farm fish. The farming period is very long, but you can produce very nutritious fish.\nTo raise fish, it is neccessary to provide light, control temperature, and food (fish food, earthworms, or insect meat).\nUnlock : Fish farming (min skill: 10), Fish farming net (3x3)
LanguageData.ReAquacultureNet.label: Large fish farming net
LanguageData.ReAquacultureNet.description: Learn how to build a larger fish farming net so that more fish can be farmed.\nUnlocks: Large Fish farming net (4x5)
LanguageData.ReFloatingSunLamp.label: Floating solar light (Fueled)
LanguageData.ReFloatingSunLamp.description: Build a floating solar light that needs fuel. It can be placed even in unstable terrain.\nUnlock : Floating solar light(need fuel)
LanguageData.ReBeans.label: Soybeans
LanguageData.ReBeans.description: Sow soybeans and edamame (immature soybeans).\nUnlocks: soybeans (min skill: 4) and edamame (min skill: 4).
LanguageData.ReZPSoil.label: Soil
LanguageData.ReZPSoil.description: Tilling the land to be suitable for agriculture.\nSoil can be placed on sand, ice, gravel, rough stone, or smooth stone.\nUnlocks: Soil (Fertility:100%)
LanguageData.ReZPSoilRich.label: Fertile Soil
LanguageData.ReZPSoilRich.description: Convert agriculturally suitable soil into highly fertile rich soil.\nUnlocks: Fertile Soil (Fertility:140%)
LanguageData.ReZPMud.label: Mud
LanguageData.ReZPMud.description: Muddy the soil for use as a paddy.\nUnlocks: Mud, Mud gathering spot
LanguageData.ReZPLandfillSoil.label: Land reclamation
LanguageData.ReZPLandfillSoil.description: Convert disturbed land back into its former or other productive uses.\nUnlocks: Reclaimed soil
LanguageData.ReScarecrow.label: Scarecrow of Fertility
LanguageData.ReScarecrow.description: Build a scarecrow with the blessing of the fertility gods.\nAs long as there is an offering (fuel), the fertility of the soil within 9 squares is increased by 30%.\nNote: Paddy fields and hydroponics do not benefit from the blessing.
LanguageData.ReSeasoning.label: Seasoning
LanguageData.ReSeasoning.description: Produce seasonings that will enrich colonists' diet.\nUnlocks: rice syrup, rice vineger, soy sauce, and miso.
LanguageData.RePreservedFood.label: Preserved meals
LanguageData.RePreservedFood.description: Produce preserved meals which last for a long time. Great for traveling.\nUnlocks: nukaduke, dried fish, natto, and nuka pot.
LanguageData.ReZPLuxury.label: Japanese haute cuisine
LanguageData.ReZPLuxury.description: Produce Japanese high-level cooking.\nUnlocks: 2 varieties of drinks and 7 varieties of luxurious meals.
LanguageData.ReZPFurniture.label: Japanese furniture Tier: 1
LanguageData.ReZPFurniture.description: Build Japanese style furniture to improve living space.\nUnlocks: straw-woven beds, Japanese hand fans (uchiwa), and Japanese braizers (hibachi)
LanguageData.ReZPFurniture2nd.label: Japanese furniture Tier: 2
LanguageData.ReZPFurniture2nd.description: Build more Japanese style furniture to further improve living space.\nUnlocks: futons ,Japanese hearths (irori),heated tables (kotasu),and sitting cushions (zabuton).
LanguageData.BlacksmithApprentice.label: Blacksmith Apprentice
LanguageData.BlacksmithApprentice.description: Craft basic-level Japanese military techonology like nagayari spears, sasumata, Japanese longbows, archery breastplates (muneate), ninja clothes, samurai clothes.
LanguageData.BlacksmithArtisan.label: Blacksmith Artisan
LanguageData.BlacksmithArtisan.description: Craft intermediate-level Japanese military techonology like Asigaru armor, lacquered helments (jingasa), Jumonji spears, Odachi blades, and Japanese longbows (poison).
LanguageData.BlacksmithMaster.label: Blacksmith Master
LanguageData.BlacksmithMaster.description: Craft master-level Japanese military techonology like Shogun Armor, Shogun helmets, and Japanese longbows (fire).
LanguageData.BlacksmithTanegasima.label: Match-lock rifles
LanguageData.BlacksmithTanegasima.description: Craft Japanese firearms like the Japanese match-lock rifle (tanegashima).
LanguageData.ReDefenseBase.label: Defense system
LanguageData.ReDefenseBase.description: Build a defense position.\nUnlocks: archery cover (kaidate), straw bundles, gunpowder straw bundles
